content: Singaporean animation company **Sparky Animation** is a Singaporean [animation company](/wiki/Animation_company). The company produces 3D animation content for worldwide markets. It also develops [original titles](/wiki/Intellectual_property) and merchandises them globally through international licences. Their research department also develops [CGI](/wiki/Computer_animation) production tools and systems. The company is also a film distributor in Asia. ## History Sparky Animation commenced operations in 2006 in Singapore, where the government provided subsidies for the entertainment industry. The television series *[Dinosaur Train](/wiki/Dinosaur_Train)* was co-produced with [The Jim Henson Company](/wiki/The_Jim_Henson_Company). In 2014, the company had about 120 employees. It had a subsidiary company in Subang Jaya, Malaysia. and production facilities in India. ## Productions/collaborations - *[3-2-1 Penguins!](/wiki/3-2-1_Penguins!)* (seasons 2–3) (2007–2008) - *[VeggieTales](/wiki/VeggieTales): Tomato Sawyer and Huckleberry Larry's Big River Rescue* (2008) - *[Dinosaur Train](/wiki/Dinosaur_Train)* (2009–2020) - *[Mr. Moon](/wiki/Mr._Moon_(TV_series))* (2010) - *[Jack](/wiki/Jack_(TV_series))* (2011–2014) - *[Fleabag Monkeyface](/wiki/Fleabag_Monkeyface)* (2011) - *The Disrespectoids* (2011, Jammy) - *One Stormy Night* (2012) - *The Fog of Courage* (2014) - *[Ruff Ruff, Tweet and Dave](/wiki/Ruff-Ruff,_Tweet_and_Dave)* (2015) - *Shaabiat al-Cartoon (**شعبية الكرتون**)* (seasons 11–12, 2016–2017) - *[*Dinosaur Train: Adventure Island*](/wiki/Dinosaur_Train)* (2021) ## Awards/Nominations *Dinosaur Train*, a coproduction between The Jim Henson Company and Sparky Animation, received the highest viewership in PBS' history.[*citation needed*] It has also been selected by Hollywood's People Magazine as the Top Kids' Show.[*citation needed*] The toys developed from *Dinosaur Train* were nominated under the 'Toy of the Year' award category by the Toy Industry Association, in 2010. At the 38th Annual Daytime Entertainment Emmy Awards, *Dinosaur Train* was nominated for Outstanding Children's Animated Program. *Jack*, a co-production with Groupe PVP Canada was nominated in the Best Animated Series category at the 27th Prix Gémeaux 2012. In May 2013, *Jack* won the Award of Excellence for the Best Animated Television Program (Ages 6 to 8) at the Youth Media Alliance in Canada. *One Stormy Night* was nominated for the Best 3D Animated Programme award at the 2012 Asian Television Awards. - MDA Animation Brochure, - Official website
title: Sparky Animation
